channel.title: Perforce on Argolon Solutions

item.title: Version Control Everything
item.description: The world of SCM and Version control has always been a major part of software development but usually comes as a big shock to new developers. SCM approaches range from global Clearcase systems with multiple sysadmins keeping it humming to single developers creating files with names like *_v01, *_v02. Many years back, I was kicking off my first project as the leader and also my first project on a non-Vax development platform.
